attributes.action: Don't allow the teachers involved in the Trojan horse plot to keep their jobs
attributes.additional_details: A deal was struck allowing the teachers involved in the Trojan horse plot to install hard-line Islamic values in several state schools in Birmingham to keep their jobs. This is an absolute disgrace, not only should they be fired, they should be banned from teaching, allowing them to keep their jobs will be the latest in failure after failure in dealing with this. A woman was fired for accidentally serving a muslim child pork but these people get to keep their jobs? It's disgraceful.
